title: GOP now using the USPS to campaign
selftext:
This was in my daily "Information Delivery Digest" of mail I would be receiving.  I am assuming other Wisconsin residents (at the very least) are receiving similar emails.

Having that email topped with GOP political fliers is not exactly what I expected when I signed up for the federal service.  It is bad enough that I have gotten four GOP sent absentee applications I did not request, along with the rest of the political junk mail.  Now I have the GOP using the USPS to directly campaigning to me in my email as well.

Next time the USPS should at least try to keep an air of neutrality.
